name: Fix My Cat Doc
description:
Welcome to the world of cats!

Fix My Cat Doc game is a simulator in which you are acting as a veterinarian. Your mission is to save as many animals as possible from torment and pain.

You have to be very careful because pet owners trust you a lot. Try not to disappoint them. Good Luck !

Game Features :
- More than 8 hospitals
- Coins collector every 2 hours
- A lot of cats which you have to treat
